name: CVE-2021-40873
description: An issue was discovered in Softing Industrial Automation OPC UA C++ SDK before 5.66, and uaToolkit Embedded before 1.40. Remote attackers to cause a denial of service (DoS) by sending crafted messages to a client or server. The server process may crash unexpectedly because of a double free, and must be restarted.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:softing:secure_integration_server:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:softing:datafeed_opc_suite:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:softing:th_scope:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:softing:opc:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:softing:uatoolkit_embedded:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:softing:uagates:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:softing:edgeconnector:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
